title: [Feature Request] Improved SSH Reconnect Experience
author: uponatime2019
body_snippet:
I frequently manage a large number of SSH connections (30+ VPS instances) using mRemoteNG and encounter frequent disconnects across various sessions. It would significantly improve usability and efficiency if the following features could be implemented to enhance the reconnection experience:

1. **Enhanced Disconnect Alert Navigation**  
   When an SSH connection is disconnected, an alert message currently appears. However, upon clicking "OK," it does not navigate to the relevant disconnected...

comments.snippet: in NB its show disconect msg inside of console, noted the rest
comments.author: Kvarkas

comments.snippet:
I fully support this request, but I wanted to add that it would be great if we could just have SSH integrated into the application. Having a separate instance of PuTTY installed isn't a great way to handle SSH for a console application that is supposed to be a single app for all consoles. I've got many places where they use PuTTY and it causes tons of confusion about which PuTTY they need to add saved sessions or which PuTTY agent they need to run for unlocking their keyfiles.
